parameters.name: Width
parameters.description: Width of the FeatureManager design tree, in pixels

title: IModelDoc2.SetFeatureManagerWidth
description: Sets the width of the FeatureManager design tree.

parameters.name: Width
parameters.description: Width of the FeatureManager design tree, in pixels

returns: Status of the set width operation (see Remarks )
remarks:
The retval argument indicates the success or failure of the set width operation:
A value of...
Indicates setting of window width...
0
Succeeded
-1
Failed

examples.title: Change Width of FeatureManager Design Tree (VBA)
